mapper.sql: icon_id, site_id, icon_img_url, icon_is_system, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from b_iconlib where icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or site_id = 0) limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into b_iconlib
icon_id,
site_id,
icon_img_url,
icon_is_system,
create_time,
update_time,
#{iconId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{iconImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iconIsSystem,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update b_iconlib
icon_img_url = #{iconImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_is_system = #{iconIsSystem,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*,l.link_name linkName FROM b_iconlib b left JOIN b_iconlink l ON b.icon_id=l.icon_id AND l.site_id = b.site_id WHERE b.site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
